name: med reminder
description:
Medreminder is a free pill reminder and medication tracker app. You may take doctor's appointments, learn more about the medications you're taking and their side effects, track your health, and share your health status with your family and friends. Its end users include senior citizens who needs reminders to take medicine, other people who keep forgetting to take pills and people living far away who wants to track their familyâ€™s health.

To view case study visit UX BY NIHARIKA
